description: This file provides functions to extract and format version information from a given dictionary 'info'. It includes functions to parse version data input as either a list or string and produce a standardized version list and version string.

methods.name: GetVersion(info)
methods.description: Extracts and returns a list of three integers representing the major, minor, and patch versions from the provided info dictionary. Handles 'version' as either a list or string and defaults missing components to 1.0.0.

methods.name: GetVersionString(info)
methods.description: Returns the version as a dot-separated string by calling GetVersion and joining its components.
